metadata.title: CVE-2021-4011 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A flaw was found in xorg-x11-server in versions before 21.1.2 and before1.20.14. An out-of-bounds access can occur in the SwapCreateRegisterfunction. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to dataconfidentiality and integrity as well as system availability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-4011` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

xdmx - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xdmx-tools - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xmir - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xnest - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xorg-server-source - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xserver-common - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xserver-xephyr - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xserver-xorg-core - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xserver-xorg-legacy - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xserver-xorg-xmir - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xvfb - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
xwayland - 2:1.18.4-0ubuntu0.12+esm1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

xmir-hwe-16.04 - 2:1.19.6-1ubuntu4.1~16.04.6+esm5
